name: Mineswept
description:
Listen up, soldier!

This here minefield needs sweepin' A.S.A.P. - pronto! Now, our tomorrow rests on your shoulders, boy. Take us home to Uncle Sam and mama's apple pie. Mmm, I can almost taste it... Make us proud, son!

Over and out!

Mineswept is a simple minesweeper clone for the Game Boy Color made during a weekend. Enjoy!

Made by Carl Lenngren, Erik Schröder and Fredrik Edman

Controls Game BoyEmulatorAction D-padArrow keysMove the cursor AXReveal a tile BZFlag a tile StartEnterStart the game Webplayer powered by binjgb.
